name: Iron Crown ex
author: OKUBO

abilities.name: Cobalt Command
abilities.effect: Attacks used by your Future Pokémon, except any Iron Crown ex, do 20 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Twin Shotels
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on those Pokémon.

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
